short_summary: The Department of National Defense intends to purchase TYPE 1 4x4 AMBULANCES.
description: Below this line is the full text of the procurement notice...
full_summary:
# Type 1 4x4 Ambulances Tender Announcement
======================================

### Tender Details

- **Reference**: PW-23-01028203
- **Notice Number**: W6399-23LM56/A
- **Publication Date**: 2023-03-01
- **Closing Date**: 2023-04-05 14:00:00
- **Amendment**: Amendment 2, issued on 2023-03-15

### Tender Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of Type 1 4x4 Ambulances. This procurement will be conducted under a Competitive and Selective Tendering process.

### Delivery Information

- **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except NCR)
- **Goods Description**: Type 1 4x4 Ambulances
- **Estimated Delivery Date**: On or before 31 December 2023

### Requirements

To participate in this procurement, bidders must hold a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-19AMBU. If a bidder wishes to become a pre-qualified supplier, they may refer to the relevant documentation on CanadaBuys.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to suppliers who wish to participate under various trade agreements, including:

- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

### Contact Information

For more information on this tender, please contact:

- Name: Mariela Ileto
- Email: mariela.ileto@forces.gc.ca
- Phone: 613-945-2746

### Debriefing Procedure

Upon receipt of the bid results, unsuccessful bidders may request a debriefing within 15 working days. The debriefing will be provided in writing, by telephone or in person.

### Language of Use

The language of this tender will be English and French. Any queries or requests must be submitted in both
